Original:
下班三五好友，約會小酌的好地方，
主餐份量十足，好吃，不踩雷。
酒類種類繁多，無限免費續帶殼花生。
每人消費平均600～1200。

招牌炸雞翅，必點，酥炸多肉汁。
週末常客滿，需提前預訂。
營業時間18:00～01:00要留意

Three or five friends from get off work, a good place for dating and drinking,
The main meal is full, delicious, not stepping on the mine.
There are many types of alcohol, with unlimited free renewal of shell peanuts.
The average consumption per person is 600 to 1200.

Signboard fried chicken wings, must be ordered, fried frying.
Full of regular customers on weekends, you need to book in advance.

Original: 氛圍不錯晚上九點後有駐唱可以點歌 餐點好吃雞翅很適合當下酒菜 份量足 適合三五好友聚會
EN: The atmosphere is good at 9 o'clock in the evening. You can sing a singing meal for delicious chicken wings.

Original: 很久沒來了，主餐的份量算多，附餐類的算少。酒類的選擇很多，價格中等。環境不錯，是因為開了很久所以開始感覺復古了嗎？以前很運動酒吧，現在比較像MTV餐廳。服務人員動作很迅速，推。
EN: It hasn't been here for a long time.There are many choices of alcohol, with medium prices.The environment is good, because it has been opened for a long time, so I started to feel retro?I used to exercise the bar, and now it is more like a MTV restaurant.The service staff moves very quickly and pushes.

Original:
覺得酷酷的老店，小時候經過到現在都屹立不搖，終於有機會來試試看🤘🏻

餐點的份量很多，適合分食（除了pizza大概六寸/6片）
雞翅表皮烤的脆脆，醬汁是水牛城辣雞翅的口味，酸辣酸辣的～
湯的話很像是牛肉的羅宋湯，蔬菜很多，喝湯也會有飽足感
披薩選擇的口味是墨西哥辣椒之類的東西，邊邊烤得脆脆，上面起司🧀很多，我覺得算好吃
搭配啤酒整體還不錯，很適合聚餐～
聽說每天還有不同的happy hour，之後有機會願意再來嘗試
EN:
The old shop that feels cool, after being a kid, has been standing now, and finally I have a chance to try it.

There are a lot of meals, suitable for splitting (except that Pizza is about six inches/6 tablets)
The chicken wings epidermis is crispy, the sauce is the flavor of the spicy chicken wings of Buffalo City, hot and sour and sour ~
The words of the soup are like beef's elobe soup. There are a lot of vegetables, and drinking soup will also feel full.
The taste of pizza is the taste of Mexican peppers. It is crispy while roasting. There are a lot of cheese. I think it's delicious.
It is not bad to match beer as a whole, it is very suitable for dinner ~
I heard that there are different happy hours every day, and then I have the opportunity to try again

EN: A good sports bar, it feels like a small tavern abroad. There are many locations but a bit crowded in the space, and the dishes are full. The meat salad, their Thai sauce is also quite spicy, but the amount is large, and the garlic bread is not bad, but it feels that it is more suitable for drinking and chatting. It is not suitable for dining.

Original:
2022.10.14

很隨興的一家店，服務員會留意空盤很快就收走。

2022.10.14
It has been a long wave of beer happy hours.

Beef and lettuce salad attached creamy garlic bread, chef ~ that ... meat, firewood ...

Original:
